description: Reports Mastodon version data and patch adoption

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT domain) AS unique_domain_count
FROM mastodon_domains;
SELECT SUM(total_users) AS total_users FROM mastodon_domains;
SELECT SUM(active_users_monthly) AS total_users FROM mastodon_domains;

panels.description: Count of distinct Mastodon versions, after various fork/meta identifiers are removed and nightly releases are normalized.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT software_version) AS unique_software_versions
FROM mastodon_domains;

panels.title: All Versions

panels.description: Count of distinct Mastodon versions, including various fork/meta identifiers.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT full_version) AS unique_software_versions
FROM mastodon_domains;

panels.title: Raw Versions

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    timestamp as "Last Crawled"
FROM mastodon_domains
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1;

panels.description: Count of instances running latest patches for any supported branch, compared to all instances.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT domain) as "All Patched"
FROM mastodon_domains
WHERE software_version IN (
    SELECT software_version
    FROM patch_versions
    WHERE n_level >= -1
);

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT domain) AS unique_domain_count
FROM mastodon_domains;

panels.title: Patched Instances, All

panels.description: Count of instances running latest patches for development branch (main), compared to the total instances on development branch.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT domain) as "Main Patched"
FROM mastodon_domains 
WHERE software_version LIKE (
    SELECT software_version 
    FROM patch_versions 
    WHERE main = True
) || '%';

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT domain) as "Main Total"
FROM mastodon_domains 
WHERE software_version LIKE (
    SELECT branch || '.%'
    FROM patch_versions 
    WHERE n_level = -1
);

panels.title: Patched Instances, Main

panels.description: Count of instances running latest patches for branch release-0 (latest), compared to the total instances on branch release-0.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT domain) as "Latest Patched"
FROM mastodon_domains 
WHERE software_version LIKE (
    SELECT software_version 
    FROM patch_versions 
    WHERE n_level = 0
) || '%';

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT domain) as "Latest Total"
FROM mastodon_domains 
WHERE software_version LIKE (
    SELECT branch || '.%'
    FROM patch_versions 
    WHERE n_level = 0
);

panels.title: Patched Instances, Latest

panels.description: Count of instances running latest patches for branch release-1 (previous), compared to the total instances on branch release-1.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT domain) as "Latest Patched"
FROM mastodon_domains 
WHERE software_version LIKE (
    SELECT software_version 
    FROM patch_versions 
    WHERE n_level = 1
) || '%';

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT domain) as "Latest Total"
FROM mastodon_domains 
WHERE software_version LIKE (
    SELECT branch || '.%'
    FROM patch_versions 
    WHERE n_level = 1
);

panels.title: Patched Instances, Previous

panels.description: Count of instances running latest patches for branch release-2 (deprecated/pending-eol), compared to the total instances on branch release-2.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT domain) as "Latest Patched"
FROM mastodon_domains 
WHERE software_version LIKE (
    SELECT software_version 
    FROM patch_versions 
    WHERE n_level = 2
) || '%';

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT domain) as "Latest Total"
FROM mastodon_domains 
WHERE software_version LIKE (
    SELECT branch || '.%'
    FROM patch_versions 
    WHERE n_level = 2
);

panels.title: Patched Instances, Deprecated

options.content: New graphs will be added here, soon.

panels.description: Count of monthly active users (MAUs) on instances running latest patches for any supported branch, compared to all instances.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT SUM(active_users_monthly) as updated_users
FROM mastodon_domains 
WHERE software_version LIKE ANY (
    SELECT software_version || '%'
    FROM patch_versions 
    WHERE n_level >= -1
);
SELECT SUM(active_users_monthly) AS total_users FROM mastodon_domains;

panels.title: Patched MAUs, All

panels.description: Count of monthly active users (MAUs) on instances running latest patches for development branch (main), compared to the total instances on development branch.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT SUM(active_users_monthly) as updated_users
FROM mastodon_domains 
WHERE software_version LIKE ANY (
    SELECT software_version || '%'
    FROM patch_versions 
    WHERE n_level = -1
);

SELECT SUM(active_users_monthly) as "Main Total"
FROM mastodon_domains
WHERE software_version LIKE (
SELECT branch || '.%'
FROM patch_versions
WHERE n_level = -1
);

panels.title: Patched MAUs, Deprecated

options.content: New graphs will be added here, soon.

targets.rawSql:
WITH version_cases AS (
  SELECT software_version
  FROM patch_versions
),
eol_check AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT software_version
  FROM mastodon_domains md
  WHERE EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 
    FROM eol_versions ev
    WHERE md.software_version LIKE ev.software_version || '.%'
       OR md.software_version LIKE ev.software_version || '%'
  )
)
SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN software_version IN (SELECT software_version FROM version_cases) THEN software_version
    WHEN software_version IN (SELECT software_version FROM eol_check) THEN 'EOL'
    ELSE 'Unpatched'
  END as version,
  COUNT(*) as count
FROM mastodon_domains 
GROUP BY CASE 
    WHEN software_version IN (SELECT software_version FROM version_cases) THEN software_version
    WHEN software_version IN (SELECT software_version FROM eol_check) THEN 'EOL'
    ELSE 'Unpatched'
  END;

WITH version_cases AS (
  SELECT software_version
  FROM patch_versions
),
eol_check AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT software_version
  FROM mastodon_domains md
  WHERE EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 
    FROM eol_versions ev
    WHERE md.software_version LIKE ev.software_version || '.%'
       OR md.software_version LIKE ev.software_version || '%'
  )
)
SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN software_version IN (SELECT software_version FROM version_cases) THEN software_version
    WHEN software_version IN (SELECT software_version FROM eol_check) THEN 'EOL'
    ELSE 'Unpatched'
  END as version,
  SUM(active_users_monthly) as user_count
FROM mastodon_domains 
GROUP BY CASE 
    WHEN software_version IN (SELECT software_version FROM version_cases) THEN software_version
    WHEN software_version IN (SELECT software_version FROM eol_check) THEN 'EOL'
    ELSE 'Unpatched'
  END;

WITH version_cases AS (
  SELECT software_version
  FROM patch_versions
),
eol_check AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT software_version
  FROM mastodon_domains md
  WHERE EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 
    FROM eol_versions ev
    WHERE md.software_version LIKE ev.software_version || '.%'
       OR md.software_version LIKE ev.software_version || '%'
  )
)
SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN software_version IN (SELECT software_version FROM version_cases) THEN software_version
    WHEN software_version IN (SELECT software_version FROM eol_check) THEN 'EOL'
    ELSE 'Unpatched'
  END as version,
  SUM(total_users) as user_count
FROM mastodon_domains 
GROUP BY CASE 
    WHEN software_version IN (SELECT software_version FROM version_cases) THEN software_version
    WHEN software_version IN (SELECT software_version FROM eol_check) THEN 'EOL'
    ELSE 'Unpatched'
  END;

SELECT 
    software_version AS "Software Version",
    COUNT(*) AS "Instances"
FROM mastodon_domains
GROUP BY software_version
ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
LIMIT 10;

SELECT 
    software_version AS "Software Version",
    SUM(active_users_monthly) AS "Monthly Active Users"
FROM mastodon_domains
GROUP BY software_version
ORDER BY SUM(active_users_monthly) DESC
LIMIT 10;

WITH version_matches AS (
    SELECT 
        md.domain,
        md.software_version,
        COALESCE(ev.software_version, pv.branch) as "Branch Version"
    FROM 
        mastodon_domains md
    LEFT JOIN eol_versions ev 
        ON md.software_version LIKE ev.software_version || '%'
    LEFT JOIN patch_versions pv 
        ON md.software_version LIKE pv.branch || '%'
    WHERE 
        ev.software_version IS NOT NULL 
        OR pv.branch IS NOT NULL
)
SELECT 
    "Branch Version",
    COUNT(domain) as "Total Domains"
FROM 
    version_matches
GROUP BY 
    "Branch Version"
ORDER BY 
    "Branch Version" DESC
LIMIT 10

WITH version_matches AS (
    SELECT 
        md.software_version,
        md.active_users_monthly,
        COALESCE(ev.software_version, pv.branch) as "Branch Version"
    FROM 
        mastodon_domains md
    LEFT JOIN eol_versions ev 
        ON md.software_version LIKE ev.software_version || '%'
    LEFT JOIN patch_versions pv 
        ON md.software_version LIKE pv.branch || '%'
    WHERE 
        ev.software_version IS NOT NULL 
        OR pv.branch IS NOT NULL
)
SELECT 
    "Branch Version",
    SUM(active_users_monthly) as "Total Users"
FROM 
    version_matches
GROUP BY 
    "Branch Version"
ORDER BY 
    "Branch Version" DESC
LIMIT 10

SELECT 
    domain AS "Domain",
    active_users_monthly AS "Active Users",
    software_version AS "Software Version"
FROM mastodon_domains 
WHERE software_version NOT IN (
    SELECT software_version 
    FROM patch_versions
)
AND NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
    FROM eol_versions
    WHERE mastodon_domains.software_version LIKE eol_versions.software_version || '%'
)
ORDER BY active_users_monthly DESC
LIMIT 10;

SELECT 
    domain AS "Domain",
    active_users_monthly AS "Active Users",
    software_version AS "Software Version"
FROM mastodon_domains 
WHERE software_version NOT IN (
    SELECT software_version 
    FROM patch_versions
)
AND EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
    FROM eol_versions
    WHERE mastodon_domains.software_version LIKE eol_versions.software_version || '%'
)
ORDER BY active_users_monthly DESC
LIMIT 10;

SELECT 
    domain AS "Domain",
    active_users_monthly AS "Active Users",
    software_version AS "Software Version"
FROM mastodon_domains 
WHERE EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
    FROM patch_versions
    WHERE mastodon_domains.software_version LIKE patch_versions.branch || '%'
    AND patch_versions.n_level >= 2
)
ORDER BY active_users_monthly DESC
LIMIT 10;

SELECT 
    domain AS "Domain",
    active_users_monthly AS "Active Users",
    software_version AS "Software Version"
FROM mastodon_domains 
WHERE EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
    FROM patch_versions
    WHERE mastodon_domains.software_version LIKE patch_versions.branch || '%'
    AND patch_versions.n_level = -1
)
ORDER BY active_users_monthly DESC
LIMIT 10;

SELECT
  statistics.date AS time,
  statistics.total_main_patched_instances AS "Main Branch",
  statistics.total_release_patched_instances AS "Latest Branch",
  statistics.total_previous_patched_instances AS "Previous Branch",
  statistics.total_pending_eol_patched_instances AS "Deprecated Branch"
FROM
  statistics
ORDER BY
  statistics.date DESC
LIMIT 30

SELECT 
    statistics.date,
    statistics.total_mastodon_domains
FROM 
    statistics
ORDER BY 
    statistics.date DESC;

panels.title: Total Mastodon Instances by Patched Release

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  statistics.date AS time,
  statistics.total_active_main_patched_users AS "Main Branch",
  statistics.total_active_release_patched_users AS "Latest Branch",
  statistics.total_active_previous_patched_users AS "Previous Branch",
  statistics.total_active_pending_eol_patched_users AS "Deprecated Branch"
FROM
  statistics
ORDER BY
  statistics.date DESC
LIMIT 30

SELECT 
    statistics.date,
    statistics.total_active_users
FROM 
    statistics
ORDER BY 
    statistics.date DESC;

panels.title: Active Mastodon Users by Patched Release

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  statistics.date AS time,
  statistics.total_main_patched_users AS "Main Branch",
  statistics.total_release_patched_users AS "Latest Branch",
  statistics.total_previous_patched_users AS "Previous Branch",
  statistics.total_pending_eol_patched_users AS "Deprecated Branch"
FROM
  statistics
ORDER BY
  statistics.date DESC
LIMIT 30

SELECT 
    statistics.date,
    statistics.total_users
FROM 
    statistics
ORDER BY 
    statistics.date DESC;

panels.title: Total Mastodon Users by Patched Release

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  statistics.date AS time,
  statistics.total_main_instances AS "Main Branch",
  statistics.total_release_instances AS "Latest Branch",
  statistics.total_previous_instances AS "Previous Branch",
  statistics.total_pending_eol_instances AS "Deprecated Branch",
  statistics.total_eol_instances AS "EOL"
FROM
  statistics
ORDER BY
  statistics.date DESC
LIMIT 30

SELECT 
    statistics.date,
    statistics.total_mastodon_domains
FROM 
    statistics
ORDER BY 
    statistics.date DESC;

SELECT
  statistics.date AS time,
  statistics.total_active_main_branch_users AS "Main Branch",
  statistics.total_active_release_branch_users AS "Latest Branch",
  statistics.total_active_previous_branch_users AS "Previous Branch",
  statistics.total_active_pending_eol_branch_users AS "Deprecated Branch",
  statistics.total_active_eol_branch_users AS "EOL"
FROM
  statistics
ORDER BY
  statistics.date DESC
LIMIT 30

SELECT 
    statistics.date,
    statistics.total_active_users
FROM 
    statistics
ORDER BY 
    statistics.date DESC;

SELECT
  statistics.date AS time,
  statistics.total_main_branch_users AS "Main Branch",
  statistics.total_release_branch_users AS "Latest Branch",
  statistics.total_previous_branch_users AS "Previous Branch",
  statistics.total_pending_eol_branch_users AS "Deprecated Branch",
  statistics.total_eol_branch_users AS "EOL"
FROM
  statistics
ORDER BY
  statistics.date DESC
LIMIT 30

SELECT 
    statistics.date,
    statistics.total_users
FROM 
    statistics
ORDER BY 
    statistics.date DESC;

options.content:
Currently tracking `Patched` as running `>= 4.4.0-alpha.3`, `>= 4.3.4`, `>= 4.2.16`, or `>= 4.1.23` which are uneffected by any known security issues identified by on the [Mastodon GitHub](https://github.com/mastodon/mastodon/security).

Models in this section are manually updated and may not be accurate for a few hours after subsequent to new GHSA/patch releases.

targets.rawSql:
WITH 
-- Define the specific versions we want to count (easy to update)
target_versions(version) AS (
    VALUES ('4.4.0-alpha.4'), ('4.4.0-alpha.3'), ('4.3.7'), ('4.3.6'), ('4.3.5'), ('4.3.4'), ('4.2.20'), ('4.2.19'), ('4.2.18'), ('4.2.17'), ('4.2.16'), ('4.1.25'), ('4.1.24'), ('4.1.23')
),
-- Count domains with specific versions
specific_versions AS (
    SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT domain) as specific_version_count
    FROM mastodon_domains
    WHERE software_version IN (SELECT version FROM target_versions)
),
-- Count domains with EOL versions
eol_versions_count AS (
    SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT md.domain) as eol_version_count
    FROM mastodon_domains md
    JOIN eol_versions ev ON md.software_version LIKE ev.software_version || '%'
    WHERE md.software_version NOT IN (SELECT version FROM target_versions)
),
-- Count all other domains
total_domains AS (
    SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT domain) as total_count
    FROM mastodon_domains
)
-- Final result with all three counts
SELECT 
    specific_version_count AS "Patched",
    eol_version_count AS "EOL",
    (total_count - specific_version_count - eol_version_count) AS "Vulnerable"
FROM specific_versions, eol_versions_count, total_domains;

panels.title: Latest GHSA Coverage by Server Count

targets.rawSql:
WITH 
-- Define the specific versions we want to count (easy to update)
target_versions(version) AS (
    VALUES ('4.4.0-alpha.4'), ('4.4.0-alpha.3'), ('4.3.7'), ('4.3.6'), ('4.3.5'), ('4.3.4'), ('4.2.20'), ('4.2.19'), ('4.2.18'), ('4.2.17'), ('4.2.16'), ('4.1.25'), ('4.1.24'), ('4.1.23')
),
-- Sum active_users_monthly for patched versions
specific_versions AS (
    SELECT COALESCE(SUM(active_users_monthly), 0) as specific_version_users
    FROM mastodon_domains
    WHERE software_version IN (SELECT version FROM target_versions)
),
-- Sum active_users_monthly for EOL versions
eol_versions_count AS (
    SELECT COALESCE(SUM(md.active_users_monthly), 0) as eol_version_users
    FROM mastodon_domains md
    JOIN eol_versions ev ON md.software_version LIKE ev.software_version || '%'
    WHERE md.software_version NOT IN (SELECT version FROM target_versions)
),
-- Sum active_users_monthly for all domains
total_users AS (
    SELECT COALESCE(SUM(active_users_monthly), 0) as total_users_count
    FROM mastodon_domains
)
-- Final result with all three sums
SELECT 
    specific_version_users AS "Patched",
    eol_version_users AS "EOL",
    (total_users_count - specific_version_users - eol_version_users) AS "Vulnerable"
FROM specific_versions, eol_versions_count, total_users;

panels.title: Latest GHSA Coverage by Active User Count

targets.rawSql:
WITH 
-- Define the specific versions we want to count (easy to update)
target_versions(version) AS (
    VALUES ('4.4.0-alpha.4'), ('4.4.0-alpha.3'), ('4.3.7'), ('4.3.6'), ('4.3.5'), ('4.3.4'), ('4.2.20'), ('4.2.19'), ('4.2.18'), ('4.2.17'), ('4.2.16'), ('4.1.25'), ('4.1.24'), ('4.1.23')
),
-- Sum total_users for patched versions
specific_versions AS (
    SELECT COALESCE(SUM(total_users), 0) as specific_version_users
    FROM mastodon_domains
    WHERE software_version IN (SELECT version FROM target_versions)
),
-- Sum total_users for EOL versions
eol_versions_count AS (
    SELECT COALESCE(SUM(md.total_users), 0) as eol_version_users
    FROM mastodon_domains md
    JOIN eol_versions ev ON md.software_version LIKE ev.software_version || '%'
    WHERE md.software_version NOT IN (SELECT version FROM target_versions)
),
-- Sum total_users for all domains
total_users AS (
    SELECT COALESCE(SUM(total_users), 0) as total_users_count
    FROM mastodon_domains
)
-- Final result with all three sums
SELECT 
    specific_version_users AS "Patched",
    eol_version_users AS "EOL",
    (total_users_count - specific_version_users - eol_version_users) AS "Vulnerable"
FROM specific_versions, eol_versions_count, total_users;

panels.title: Latest GHSA Coverage by Total User Count

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    domain AS "Domain",
    software_version AS "Software Version",
    full_version as "Raw Version",
    total_users AS "Total Users",
    active_users_monthly as "Active Users",
    timestamp as "Last Crawled (UTC)"
FROM mastodon_domains
ORDER BY total_users DESC;

title: vmcrawl
